tagline.title: KINTAMANI AND HOT SPRING TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR PACKAGES FOR ENJOY SEE THE VIEW MT. BATUR VOLCANO AND THEN ENJOY SOAKING AT BATUR NATURAL HOT SPRING
tagline.text: KINTAMANI AND HOT SPRING TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR PACKAGES FOR ENJOY SEE THE VIEW MT. BATUR VOLCANO AND THEN ENJOY SOAKING AT BATUR NATURAL HOT SPRING
tagline.html: KINTAMANI AND HOT SPRING TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR PACKAGES FOR ENJOY SEE THE VIEW MT. BATUR VOLCANO AND THEN ENJOY SOAKING AT BATUR NATURAL HOT SPRING

description.text: Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour is a Bali Full Day Tour Packages tour to see the beautiful views of Mount Batur and Lake Batur from Kintamani village and continue with a soak in the hot springs at Batur Natural Hot Spring, which is believed to contain many minerals which are good for health. A very impressive experience where you do sightseeing and soak in hot water in one day of the tour. First, our tour driver will pick you up at the hotel and go straight to the first tourist destination, namely Goa Gajah Temple, which is a historical site where we can see the relics of Shiva and Buddha here, continue to Tirta Empul Temple, which is a holy temple which has a holy spring. which is often used as holy water for self-purification, continue to Kintamani village to see the view of Mount Batur and Lake Batur from this place, and we will enjoy lunch at the restaurant in this place, with a strategic restaurant position with views of the mountain and Lake Batur from restaurants. After lunch, the trip continues to the Batur Natural Hot Spring to enjoy soaking in a hot spring pool that comes from a hot spring sourced from the mountains, with views of Lake Batur making the soaking atmosphere very pleasant, after soaking we will go to your hotel. stay with a very impressive experience on a one day tour to Kintamani with views of Mount Batur and soaking in the hot springs of Batur, accompanied by an experienced and friendly driver will make this tour very enjoyable

A very impressive experience where you do sightseeing and soak in hot water in one day of the tour. First, our tour driver will pick you up at the hotel and go straight to the first tourist destination, namely Goa Gajah Temple, which is a historical site where we can see the relics of Shiva and Buddha here, continue to Tirta Empul Temple, which is a holy temple which has a holy spring. which is often used as holy water for self-purification, continue to Kintamani village to see the view of Mount Batur and Lake Batur from this place, and we will enjoy lunch at the restaurant in this place, with a strategic restaurant position with views of the mountain and Lake Batur from restaurants. After lunch, the trip continues to the Batur Natural Hot Spring to enjoy soaking in a hot spring pool that comes from a hot spring sourced from the mountains, with views of Lake Batur making the soaking atmosphere very pleasant, after soaking we will go to your hotel. stay with a very impressive experience on a one day tour to Kintamani with views of Mount Batur and soaking in the hot springs of Batur, accompanied by an experienced and friendly driver will make this tour very enjoyable

title.title: Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour | Goa Gajah Temple (Elephant Cave Temple)

image.title: Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour | Goa Gajah Temple (Elephant Cave Temple) | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Goa Gajah Temple is first site we will visit during Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour, is a historic site from ancient times full of historical value, located in Blahbatuh village, Gianyar. It is estimated that it was built in 10-11 AD during the Warmadewa royal dynasty. The name Goa Gajah refers to the carvings on the top of the cave which are carved with Ganesha, and inside the cave there is a Trilingga relic, and around the cave there are Ganesha relics and Buddha Relics. Based on archeological findings as mentioned above, it can be known the Goa Gajah Temple, in the past, it served as a monastery of Buddhist monks and Shivite priests. This conservatism also shows the unification of Buddhism and Shiva went well. An experience where you can see the acculturation of the influence of Hinduism and Buddhism here
description.html: Goa Gajah Temple is first site we will visit during Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour, is a historic site from ancient times full of historical value, located in Blahbatuh village, Gianyar. It is estimated that it was built in 10-11 AD during the Warmadewa royal dynasty. The name Goa Gajah refers to the carvings on the top of the cave which are carved with Ganesha, and inside the cave there is a Trilingga relic, and around the cave there are Ganesha relics and Buddha Relics. Based on archeological findings as mentioned above, it can be known the Goa Gajah Temple, in the past, it served as a monastery of Buddhist monks and Shivite priests. This conservatism also shows the unification of Buddhism and Shiva went well. An experience where you can see the acculturation of the influence of Hinduism and Buddhism here

title.title: Tirta Empul Temple | Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour

image.title: Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour | Tirta Empul Temple| Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tirta Empul Temple is second site we will visit during Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour, is a sacred spring temple in Tampak Siring, Gianyar, which functions as a holy place to worship the god Indra, based on inscriptions found that this Tirta Empul Temple was built in 1100 AD during the era of the kingdom of Raja Masula and Masuli on the island of Bali. There is a sacred relic, namely the buffalo which is considered the vehicle of Lord Shiva and also there is a holy spring in this temple which functions as holy water which is often used to purify oneself from negative influences in the body spiritually. Over time, many tourists come to this place to visit the uniqueness of this temple and there are also several tourists who carry out the process of purifying themselves in the purification pool at the Tirta Empul Temple.

title.title: Kintamani View Mt. Batur Volcano | Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour

image.title: Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour | Kintamani View Mt. Batur Volcano | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kintamani View Mt. Batur Volcano is third site we will visit during Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour, Kintamani is a village located in Bangli Regency, one of the tourist attractions where from Kintamani, precisely in the Penelokan area, we can see views of the still active Batur volcano and also views of Lake Batur from this place. Looking from a distance makes the view of Mount Batur and Lake Batur visible side by side. A very spectacular sight. Mount Batur is still classified as an active volcano, the eruptions occurred in 1965, 1974 and 1994 and the last eruption was in 2000 and in 2009 there was an increase in volcanic activity at Mount Batur even though no eruption occurred. Along the cliff there is a restaurant with views of Mount Batur and Lake Batur from the restaurant, we will enjoy lunch at the restaurant in this place

button.title: Kintamani View Mt. Batur Volcano | Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour

description.text: Batur Natural Hot Spring is fourth site we will visit during Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour, is a tourist destination to enjoy soaking in a hot spring pool where the hot springs come from Mount Batur. The mineral content in the water is very good for health. Many people even come here for health therapy. Enjoy the warm hot water of Mount Batur and the view of Lake Batur around the pool makes the soaking atmosphere very pleasant. The natural hot springs that flow into the swimming pool at Batur Natural Hot Spring have a temperature of around 37-40 degrees Celsius. This truly natural water source will provide freshness and refreshing natural therapy. A very impressive experience where you can enjoy the warm hot water from the hot springs originating from Mount Batur which is believed to contain many minerals that are good for the body and skin.

price.title: Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of West Bali Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 550,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 850,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,250,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 800,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Batur Natural Hot Spring Admission Fee + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

itinerary.title: Bali Kintamani and Hot Spring Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Visit Goa Gajah Temple
Visit Tirta Empul Temple
Visit Kintamani View Mt. Batur Volcano

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
